steps.title: Go with a fine mesh weave fishnet pattern.
steps.content: Go with a fine mesh weave fishnet pattern. Fine-patterned fishnets look elegant and classy rather than racy and flirty. Choose these if you want to create polished, professional outfits with fishnets. Look for a pattern of fishnet with a very small weave at most clothing and department stores. [1] X Research source The smaller the pattern, the easier it is to suggest sophistication.

steps.title: Choose from oval, circle, diamond, or abstract shaped tight patterns.
steps.content: Choose from oval, circle, diamond, or abstract shaped tight patterns. There are all sorts of fishnet patterns to choose from! Go with an oval or circular shape for a subtle, classy style, or go for a diamond or abstract pattern for a touch of style and glam. With whatever pattern you choose, you can easily create elegant looks. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select black, brown, or nude fishnets to wear with daytime outfits.
steps.content: Select black, brown, or nude fishnets to wear with daytime outfits. Neutral-colored fishnets look best if you are wearing them to work, while running errands, or out to brunch. Pair your tights with other neutral-colored garments, such as denim, khaki, black, or navy. [3] X Research source For example, style brown fishnets with a brown skirt and a cream-colored blouse for a work-appropriate option. Wear nude fishnets with a black A-line skirt for an elegant accent.

steps.title: Choose colored fishnets for a flirty nighttime touch.
steps.content: Choose colored fishnets for a flirty nighttime touch. If you want to add a pop of color to your evening style, try blue, pink, or purple fishnets. This is a great idea if you are going out on a date, to a concert, or out to a club. [4] X Research source To keep your outfit elegant, style your colored fishnets with neutral tops and bottoms. This way, you look mature and classy. If you wear colored tights during the day, it can look juvenile.

steps.title: Pair your fishnets with solid-colored tops to keep your look balanced.
steps.content: Pair your fishnets with solid-colored tops to keep your look balanced. When styling fishnets elegantly, you don’t want to over-do your outfit. Instead of choosing outfits with loud patterns or graphics, choose simple garments. This way, the pattern of your fishnets can stand out. [5] X Research source For example, choose a solid grey shirt or blouse to wear with shorts or a skirt.

steps.title: Choose skirts, dresses, and shorts that are at least knee-length.
steps.content: Choose skirts, dresses, and shorts that are at least knee-length. When styling your fishnets, avoid picking bottoms that come above the knee, like mini-skirts or very short shorts. That way, you’ll look classy rather than flirty. [6] X Research source For example, wear your fishnets with a knee-length skirt and a ruffled blouse for a classy, work-appropriate option. Wear your fishnets with a skirt and tank top for a summertime style.

steps.title: Wear fishnets underneath ripped, distressed denim for an edgy look.
steps.content: Wear fishnets underneath ripped, distressed denim for an edgy look. If you want a rocker-chic style, put your fishnets on, and then slip a pair of distressed jeans over top. This multi-dimensional style looks great when going to a concert or a bar. [7] X Research source You can pair this with a plain black T-shirt, for instance.

steps.title: Choose black outfits for a stylish, monochrome look.
steps.content: Choose black outfits for a stylish, monochrome look. When selecting neutral-colored outfits, you can choose all of the same tones for a stylish look. This is a good idea when styling fishnets elegantly because there will not be competing colors and textures. [8] X Research source For instance, choose a black button-down, black skirt, and black shoes.

steps.title: Try wearing solid-colored tights underneath for a two-toned look.
steps.content: Try wearing solid-colored tights underneath for a two-toned look. First, put on a pair of opaque tights. Then, put your fishnets on overtop. Use either colored or neutral fishnets to create a multidimensional look. [9] X Research source For instance, wear white tights underneath red fishnets for a fun night-out look. You can wear nude tights underneath of black fishnets for a subtle, sophisticated style.

steps.title: Try fishnet socks with pants for a touch of glamor.
steps.content: Try fishnet socks with pants for a touch of glamor. In addition to wearing fishnets with skirts or dresses, you can also wear them with pants. This is a great idea if you want to add a feminine touch to an outfit for the office. Choose trousers for a professional option or go with jeans for a casual style. [10] X Research source For example, wear fishnet socks underneath tapered jeans for a subtle, flirty touch. Wear this on date nights or out to dinner with friends.

steps.title: Go with close-toed shoes for a put-together look.
steps.content: Go with close-toed shoes for a put-together look. Choose sneakers for casual looks, boots for edgy styles, or heels for a touch of glam. Pairing your tights with close-toed shoes keeps your look polished and professional. [11] X Research source For example, put on a pair of black pumps with black fishnets and a little black dress for an elegant evening style. You can also wear your fishnets with canvas shoes, flats, or Oxfords.
